resources.string:
Hi, my name is Edmund. 

I love fish. 

The kind that is fresh-caught and swims around on a plate. 
Fun fact is that I have several farms. 

I like eating fish, too. Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish. Poached fish - not so much. 
And sometimes I even go fishing, nope. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Nowhere, and very hungry, I even caught a large salmon that never existed with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own aquarium. 
You should ask someone else about fishing, though.
